title: West, Bruce & Laing - Discography [FLAC]
description:
West, Bruce & Laing is the legendary supergroup formed by Mountain members Leslie West (guitar, vocals) & Corky Laing (drums) together with Ex-Cream bassist and keyboarder Jack Bruce. There exist only three official releases - in this discography included are their newest remasters as well as three unofficial live recordings. 


West, Bruce & Laing - Why Dontcha
Label: Esoteric Recordings - ECLEC 2334
Format: CD, Album, Reissue, Remastered
Country: UK & Europe
Released: 30 Jul 2012
Originally released 1972

Tracklist:

01. Why Dontcha	03:04
02. Out Into The Fields	04:41

04. Turn Me Over	02:45
05. Third Degree	05:16
06. Shake Ma Thing (Rollin Jack)	03:14
07. While You Sleep	03:24

10. Pollution Woman	04:28
